name: places/ChIJ3aC_E3RZwokR8ypy0qTrgms
formattedAddress: 452 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 452 Columbus Ave, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text: First time customer and I’m already a fan! The staffs are super friendly, very patient. and professional. Offered great advice and showed me tons of frame options for my poster. The ETA was two weeks but I got the notification that my framed poster was ready to pick up in just 5 days. Really happy with the result, my frame is beautiful, and will definitely bring more art prints over to have them framed! Highly recommend this place.

text.text: First time customer and I’m already a fan! The staffs are super friendly, very patient. and professional. Offered great advice and showed me tons of frame options for my poster. originalText.text:
Framebridge, located on the Upper West Side (right next to The Strand), is incredible. I'm so thankful Framebridge opened a store in this neighborhood! I worked with Carlton to get a bunch of items framed, including two diplomas, and the in-store process was seamless. Carlton & the team explained things step-by-step, so it was clear what my items would look like with the framing I chose and where things would be sent to be processed before shipping back to me. I felt heard as I was describing my vision for my items - Carlton captured exactly what I needed (and added his great recommendations for accents + additional framing techniques, which made everything appear so lovely).

My items shipped back to me exactly as outlined, in a timely manner! I haven't unwrapped each piece from the bubbled packaging quite yet, but I'm so excited to get all items to my office & finally hung-up on my walls! :-) Thank you, Framebridge!!

originalText.text: Shopped around to get a couple of pictures. The costs were way over my budget. I was fortunate to find the Framebridge on 82nd St. I liked the fact that the prices are clearly displayed. You get a good idea of what your cost will be. No surprises, no games. Carlton was the best. He knew his stuff and helped me make the right selections and the service was excellent. I am very pleased with the finished product. Definitely will go back.

originalText.text: Great store! Filled with fun art that inspired me. The staff was lovely and helpful. My framed art came out perfect and expertly done. They even had treats for my two Italian Greyhounds! Denisse was great, but everyone I spoke with in the store the few times I was there was friendly and knowledgeable!

text.text: Great store! Filled with fun art that inspired me. The staff was lovely and helpful. My framed art came out perfect and expertly done. They even had treats for my two Italian Greyhounds! Denisse was great, but everyone I spoke with in the store the few times I was there was friendly and knowledgeable!

originalText.text: Walked in on Sunday and Daniel couldn't have been nicer! He took great care of my vintage poster and really made some amazing suggestions for what frame would look best. Daniel was a true professional and I would definitely go to this Framebridge for any future framing needs.
